com.gtomato.android.ui.widget

Enum CarouselView.DisplayMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CarouselView.DisplayMode>
      • com.gtomato.android.ui.widget.CarouselView.DisplayMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CarouselView.DisplayMode>
    Enclosing class:
    CarouselView
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public static enum CarouselView.DisplayMode
extends java.lang.Enum<CarouselView.DisplayMode>
    Display modes/styles of CarouselView. Please refer to the CarouselView demo.

    Currently, there is only a very limited set of display styles. Please use Custom and provide a custom transformation implementation if they do not suit your need.
